item.title: About me
item.author: zellyn@zellyn.com (Zellyn Hunter)
item.description: My name is Zellyn Hunter. My wife is Bevin My son is Rowen I grew up in Durban, South Africa I worked at YouTube in San Francisco for five years, from 2010-2015 I moved back to Atlanta, and now work at Square

item.title: Projects: TODO
item.author: zellyn@zellyn.com (Zellyn Hunter)
item.description: This is a list of side projects I would like to do. I’m trying to create a structured list of next steps: hopefully that’ll make it easier to pick off tasks to work on, and (less likely) attract interest from others. 6502 Golf site comp.sys.apple2 folks sometimes like to collaborate/compete on golfing 6502 code. I thought it would be fun to create a site for 6502 golfing. Leaderboards would be fun, and being able to track the tree of ideas (by giving credit or explicitly starting with code and modifying it) would be instructive.
